text: وَلَهُ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَعَشِيّٗا وَحِينَ تُظۡهِرُونَ

translation.en: And to Him is [due all] praise throughout the heavens and the earth. And [exalted is He] at night and when you are at noon
translation.id: dan segala puji bagi-Nya di langit, di bumi, pada malam hari dan pada waktu zuhur (tengah hari)
